name: DLink | DxS | Network | BGP | Established (SYSLOG)
description: INFO(6) [BGP(1):] BGP connection is successfully established Peer:<10.110.0.110>.

patterns.value_re: (?:INFO:|INFO\(6\)) \[BGP(\(1\))?:\] BGP connection is successfully established Peer:<(?P<peer>\S+)>\.

name: DLink | DxS | Network | BGP | Peer Down #1 (SYSLOG)
description: INFO(6) [BGP(2):] BGP connection is normally closed (Peer:<10.110.0.110>).

name: DLink | DxS | Network | BGP | Peer Down #2 (SYSLOG)
description: WARN: [BGP:] BGP connection is closed due to Event: <10> (Peer:<10.0.0.1>).

patterns.value_re: (?:WARN:|WARN\(4\)) \[BGP(\(2\))?:\] BGP connection is closed due to Event: <\d+> \(Peer:<(?P<peer>\S+)>\)\.
